title: Fail to import a definition file with DisplayOrder not being unique across CaseTypeId for a Jurisdiction in AccessTypeRoles
specs: contains a definition file with new tab AccessTypeRoles where DisplayOrder is not unique across CaseTypeId for a Jurisdiction

body.__plainTextValue__: Validation errors occurred importing the spreadsheet.- 'DisplayOrder' must be unique across all Case Types for a given Jurisdiction in the sheet 'AccessTypeRoles'
